list-item.p: Clinically diagnosed Stage II or Stage III ESCC staged according to the 11 th edition of the Japanese Classification of Esophageal Cancer. [ 11, 12]
Patients considered eligible for radical esophagectomy under general anesthesia.
Aged between 20 and 74 years at the time of enrollment.
Patients with ECOG performance status 0, 1, or 2.
Confirmed adequate organ functions within 14 days before enrollment. The following clinical test standards were used:

list-item.label: e.
list-item.p: Glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase, glutamic pyruvic transaminase ≤twice the upper limit of the institutional reference value
Oral and written informed consent obtained before registration.
